title.narrative: Increased production and local sales of coffee

description.narrative:
Action plan 2016 is focusing on improved production, both in quantity and quality. Besides, MCCCU wants to work on and profit from increased local consumption of coffee (marketing local coffee).To achieve increased production per member cooperative society, more agronomists will be hired. These agronomists will work on: Training on good quality coffee, fertilizer, and application of manure, d management of demo farms
Set targets for 2016: 1. Improve the quality and the quantity of both the green coffee and the brewed coffee by 20% in 2016, 30% in 2017 and 50% in 2018.2. Increase the local consumption of the brewed coffee by 50% in 2016
Activities in action plan:
- Hire more agronomists (extension staff)- Recruit TOTs (Model farmers can be recruited to be TOTs) and jointly train them with the agronomists. - Set production related targets for the trained TOTs to be able to deliver. Come up with a structure on how to monitor them with focus on efficiency and effectiveness.-Operationalise the business plan developed in 2015 by coming up with annual plans for 2016 and 2017. -Build capacity of the Board members at MCCCU to enhance better:a) Management of MCCCU’s many business units through A dashboard b) Team cohesiveness. (MCCCU to elaborate ToR)-Participate in the governance training organized by Agriterra and come up with a plan of approach to governance challenges.-Build the capacity of the management team of MCCCU to be able to support the board run MCCCU more efficiently (exchange visit?) - Install an ERP-like software suitable to MCCCU’s operations as per the needs assessment conduct in 2015 (Clear TOR to be developed with the assistance of Agriterra before implementation)- Elaborate the TOR for the coffee management system suitable for societies-Come up with a financial proposal for negotiating cheaper working capital for inputs-Implementation of the Nov 2015 FM training recommendations-Participate in Agriterra’s strategic financial management training-Conduct a market research and come up with a marketing plan to boost the sales of the grounded and brewed coffee in Kenya-Improve the visibility of the Mt Kenya brand of coffee and thus increase its distribution- Building the capacity of MCCCU to be able to offer farmer services to its affiliated society’s i.e offer an advice on how to build a structure for MCCCU to be able to offer member services to its primary society members.
1. Improve the quality and the quantity of both the green coffee and the brewed coffee by 20% in 2016, 30% in 2017 and 50% in 2018.2. Increase the local consumption of the brewed coffee by 50% in 2016
